column1: Warden of Westmarch was a title granted by Thain Peregrin Took
column2: to Fastred of Greenholm in Fourth Age 34.
passed by Fastred to his son Elfstan Fairbairn
column3: and associated from then on with the Fairbairn Family. They held the heirloom of the Red Book of Westmarch.

column1: It is unknown if the Warden was just a title
column2: or also had any offices of responsibilities.
